sql.if: and trunc(DATA_DATE) between trunc(to_date(#{sdate},'yyyy/MM/dd')) and trunc(to_date(#{edate},'yyyy/MM/dd'))

mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.index_id AS "indexId", a.index_name AS "indexName", a.element AS "element", a.data_date AS "dataDate", a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.name AS "patientName", a.visit_id AS "visitId", a.identity AS "identity", a.charge_type AS "chargeType", a.birth_place AS "birthPlace", a.operation_no AS "operationNo", a.operation_code AS "operationCode", a.ope_start_time AS "opeStartTime", a.ope_end_time AS "opeEndTime", a.is_qualified AS "isQualified", a.operation_desc AS "operationDesc", a.chief_doctor AS "chiefDoctor", a.operator AS "operator", a.anaesthesia_method AS "anaesthesiaMethod", a.operating_date AS "operatingDate", a.admission_date_time AS "admissionDateTime", a.discharge_date_time AS "dischargeDateTime", a.dept_code AS "deptCode", a.sex AS "sex"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pre_ope_patient_index_rec( id, index_id, index_name, element, data_date, patient_id, name, visit_id, identity, charge_type, birth_place, operation_no, operation_code, ope_start_time, ope_end_time, is_qualified, operation_desc, chief_doctor, operator, anaesthesia_method, operating_date, admission_date_time, discharge_date_time, dept_code, sex ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{indexId}, #{indexName}, #{element}, #{dataDate}, #{patientId}, #{patientName}, #{visitId}, #{identity}, #{chargeType}, #{birthPlace}, #{operationNo}, #{operationCode}, #{opeStartTime}, #{opeEndTime}, #{isQualified}, #{operationDesc}, #{chiefDoctor}, #{operator}, #{anaesthesiaMethod}, #{operatingDate}, #{admissionDateTime}, #{dischargeDateTime}, #{deptCode}, #{sex} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pre_ope_patient_index_rec SET index_id = #{indexId}, index_name = #{indexName}, element = #{element}, data_date = #{dataDate}, patient_id = #{patientId}, name = #{patientName}, visit_id = #{visitId}, identity = #{identity}, charge_type = #{chargeType}, birth_place = #{birthPlace}, operation_no = #{operationNo}, operation_code = #{operationCode}, ope_start_time = #{opeStartTime}, ope_end_time = #{opeEndTime}, is_qualified = #{isQualified}, operation_desc = #{operationDesc}, chief_doctor = #{chiefDoctor}, operator = #{operator}, anaesthesia_method = #{anaesthesiaMethod}, operating_date = #{operatingDate}, admission_date_time = #{admissionDateTime}, discharge_date_time = #{dischargeDateTime}, dept_code = #{deptCode}, sex = #{sex} WHERE id = #{id}
